description: Capsuleer spaceships of all sizes and roles, including advanced and faction variants of many hull types

children.description: Fast and cheap vessels for easy transport
Small spaceships that excel in any role involving speed and agility
Small, fast vessels suited to a variety of purposes.
Frigate variants intended for specialized purposes.
Sturdy and powerful frigates built for all-out combat.
Frigates specialized in repairing their allies
Medium-sized spaceships intended for a variety of roles
The middle children of the starship industry, but not to be underestimated.
Cruiser variants intended for specialized purposes.
Support ships, engineered for field assistance in large engagements.
Sturdy and powerful cruisers built for all-out combat.
Cruisers specialized in reconnaissance operations and electronic warfare.
Cruiser-class vessels, designed to pull other vessels out of warp.
Highly advanced cruisers that use modular components to achieve maximum versatility.
Heavily armed spaceships that sacrifice durability for extra firepower
Anti-frigate gunboats.  The middle ground between a frigate and a cruiser.
These destroyers have additional attributes to help them specialize in specific roles.
Destroyer-class vessels designed to pull other starships out of warp.
Medium-sized spaceships that are more powerful than normal cruisers
A class of powerful combat vessels midway between cruisers and battleships.
Advanced battlecruisers make use of advanced technology for maximum effectiveness in a certain role.
Battlecruiser-class vessels, designed to aid their allies on the battlefield.
Large-sized spaceships with enough offensive and defensive capabilities to tackle all but the biggest problems
The foundations of any respectable fighting force.
By focusing the design down to a single purpose, these battleships excel at their designated tasks like no other starship can.
Battleship-Class vessels, designed to operate behind enemy lines.
Battleship-Class vessels, intended for prolonged frontline deployment.
Huge spaceships capable of dominating battlefields or industry sectors
Capital ships created for extended sieges of stationary installations.
Specialized Dreadnoughts capable of operating disruptive lance superweapons
Capital ships, able to transport a world and a half and then some.
Fathers of the fleet, the biggest of the big.
Capital warships, able to transport and deploy hordes of smaller vessels into the field.
Capital ships designed to be the industrial backbone of any fleet.
Capital cargo ships with jump drive capabilities, bringing trade and commerce to distant stars.
Capital warships, able to support fleets with their logistics power.
Haulers and industrial ships that form the backbone of the economy
Built for the transportation of vast amounts of cargo.
Advanced haulers are modified for specific purposes.
Advanced technologies for the transportation of valuable materials.
Ships specially designed to harvest resources in space
Lumbering, voracious hulks, expressly created for ore accumulation.
Rare and visually distinct ships of interest to collectors
Industrial ships which have been offered to capsuleers on occasion for limited periods.
Shuttles which have been offered to capsuleers on occasion for limited periods.
Frigates which have been offered to capsuleers on occasion for limited periods.
Battleships which have been offered to capsuleers on occasion for limited periods.
Heavy Assault Cruisers which have been offered to capsuleers on occasion for limited periods.
Assault Frigates which have been offered to capsuleers on occasion for limited periods.
Logistics Ships which have been offered to capsuleers on occasion for limited periods.
Battlecruisers which have been offered to capsuleers on occasion for limited periods.
Cruisers which have been offered to capsuleers on occasion for limited periods.
Heavy Interdiction Cruisers which have been offered to capsuleers on occasion for limited periods.
Destroyers which have been offered to capsuleers on occasion for limited periods.
Corvettes that have been offered to capsuleers on occasion for limited periods.
Electronic Attack Frigates which have been offered to capsuleers on occasion for limited periods.

description: Equipment modules for spaceships, including many types of weapon, electronic, engineering, armor, shield and propulsion systems

children.description: Weapon systems to inflict damage on enemy targets
Hybrid turrets are specifically designed to house railguns and blasters.
Railguns use magnetic rails to fire solid chunks of matter at hypersonic speed.
Fast-tracking, low-damage railguns, for use on frigates.
Medium-sized railguns, for use on cruisers.
Slow-tracking, high-damage railguns, for use on battleships.
Capital ship railguns, for use on dreadnoughts and titans.
Blasters fire magnetically contained balls of subatomic particles.
Fast-tracking, low-damage blasters, for use on frigates.
Medium-sized blasters, for use on cruisers.
Slow-tracking, high-damage blasters, for use on battleships.
Capital ship blasters, for use on dreadnoughts and titans.
Built to house cannons capable of firing superheated gunshells.
Autocannons are effective at close ranges and possess great tracking ability.
Frigate-sized autocannons, effective at very close ranges.
Cruiser-sized weapons. Deliver a rapid-fire barrage of shells at close ranges.
Battleship-sized autocannons. Deal massive damage, up close and personal.
Capital ship autocannons, for use on dreadnoughts and titans.
Slow-firing long-range cannons, able to deal crippling blows with great economy.
Small artillery cannons, suitable for frigate use.
Medium artillery cannons, suitable for cruiser use.
Large artillery cannons, suitable for battleship use.
Capital ship artillery cannons, for use on dreadnoughts and titans.
Laser turrets are built to house beam and pulse lasers.
Beam lasers fire a concentrated, persistent stream of energy at their target.
Small beam lasers, suitable for frigate use.
Medium beam lasers, suitable for cruiser use.
Large beam lasers, suitable for battleship use.
Capital ship beam lasers, for use on dreadnoughts and titans.
Pulse lasers emit an oscillating energy beam at their target.
Small pulse lasers, suitable for frigate use.
Medium pulse lasers, suitable for cruiser use.
Large pulse lasers, suitable for battleship use.
Capital ship pulse lasers, for use on dreadnoughts and titans.
For the launching of jet-propelled guided missiles.
For the launching of swift-moving rocket projectiles.
For the launching of light missiles.
For the launching of heavy missiles.
For the launching of cruise missiles.  Can also fit torpedoes.
For the launching of torpedoes and cruise missiles.
For the launching of XL torpedoes.  Can only be fitted on dreadnoughts and titans.
For the launching of assault missiles.
Subsystems designed to improve weapon efficiency.
Systems designed to improve missile launcher efficiency.
Systems designed to improve projectile weapon efficiency.
Systems designed to improve laser weapon efficiency.
Systems designed to improve hybrid weapon efficiency.
Computerized systems designed to improve turret tracking.
Hardwired systems designed to improve turret tracking.
Designed to give a boost to another ship's tracking speed.
Modules designed to augment and enhance a capital ship's siege warfare abilities.
Increases damage and rate of fire for Entropic Disintegrators
Large launchers, designed for stealth bombers for bomb deployment.
Capital ship entropic disintegrators, for use on dreadnoughts and titans.
Modules that strengthen the physical frame of a spaceship against external dangers
Reinforced armor plates for additional protection.
Nano-assembler technology at its best. Repair armor on the fly.
Armor repair designs, intended for frigate-class vessels.
Armor repair designs, intended for cruiser-class vessels.
Armor repair designs, intended for battleship-class vessels.
Armor repair designs, intended for capital-class vessels.
Struts and braces that help improve a starship's structural integrity.
Lightweight materials that provide a boost in speed by weakening a starship's internal structure.
The extra bulk this expansion adds to a starship reduces its speed, but gives it more room to store cargo.
Armor Hardeners that shift resistance based on damaged received.
Armor Hardeners that can be reconfigured on the fly using scripts.
Patch up your comrades at a distance.
Remote armor repair system designs, intended for capital-class vessels.
Remote armor repair system designs, intended for battleship-class vessels.
Remote armor repair system designs, intended for cruiser-class vessels.
Remote armor repair system designs, intended for frigate-class vessels.
Hull repair system designs, intended for frigate-class vessels.
Hull repair system designs, intended for cruiser-class vessels.
Hull repair system designs, intended for battleship-class vessels.
Hull repair system designs, intended for Capital vessels.
Containment field emitters and redundancy systems for prevention of critical system damage.
Repair the hulls of your allies at range, always handy after those close call situations.
Remote hull repair system designs, intended for use on frigate-class vessels.
Remote hull repair system designs, intended for use on cruiser-class vessels.
Remote hull repair system designs, intended for use on battleship-class vessels.
Remote hull repair system designs, intended for use on capital-class vessels.
Mass Entanglers lower ship mass at the cost of ship velocity.
Modules that affect the navigational properties of a spaceship
Ultra-advanced propulsion subsystems giving a massive speed boost.
Hull modifications designed to increase a ship's speed.
Ship systems that stabilize the ship and allow for more graceful maneuvers.
Ship systems that add more raw power to the ship's engines.
Ship systems that help to keep the warp drive operational, despite interference.
Modules which negate the effects of warp disrupt probes and mobile warp disruptors
Provide additional thrust to the ship's engines.
Advanced propulsion technology that allows for a jump over a very short distance.
Omnidirectional energy blasts that damage everything in a radius. Good against drones
The smallest smartbombs available, for when powergrid and CPU are scarce.
Modules that strengthen the energy barrier surrounding spaceships against external dangers
Provide an increase to the shield's recharge rate.
The smallest of the shield transporters, for when CPU and powergrid are scarce.
Strengthen various aspects of the shields' subatomic containment fields.
Boost the maximum strength of the ship's shield system.
Convert energy from the ship's core into additional shield power.
Supercharged shield boosting units for advanced battleship pilots.
Focus and amplify the efficiency of shield boosting modules.
Computerized systems designed to give a temporary increase in shield resistance.
Shield Hardeners that can be reconfigured on the fly using scripts.
Increase shield recharge rate while lowering maximum shield capacity.
Divert power from ship's core to shields, increasing shield recharge rate.
Modules that affect a spaceship's capacitor and modify fitting capabilities
Monitor and optimize the power grid and capacitor systems.
Run power core optimization subroutines for maximum efficiency.
Supplementary systems providing a flat boost to powercore energy.
Neutralize a portion of the target ship's capacitor energy.
Steal a portion of the target ship's capacitor energy.
Systems allowing transfer of capacitor energy to another ship.
Allow the capacitor to store more energy.
Give a small increase in capacitor energy.
Provide a boost to the capacitor's recharge rate.
Increase capacitor recharge rate while lowering maximum capacitor capacity.
Increase capacitor recharge rate at the expense of shield boosting capability.
Provide quick injections of power into the capacitor.
Small capacitor boosters, for when powergrid and CPU are scarce.
Modules that strengthen the sensory capabilities of a spaceship
Augment a ship's targeting range and target acquisition time.
Provide a boost to a ship's targeting range and target acquisition time.
Allow for surreptitious targeting of hostiles.
Augment target ship's targeting range and target acquisition time.
Use advanced spatial distortion technology to render ships invisible.
Provide an increase in the ship's CPU output.
Modules that can disrupt capabilities of enemy targets and defend against same
Designed to disrupt and lock down enemy ships' sensor arrays.
Targeting jammers specialized for use against magnetometric sensors.
Targeting jammers specialized for use against Ladar sensors.
Targeting jammers specialized for use against gravimetric sensors.
Targeting jammers specialized for use against radar sensors.
Targeting jammers that induce multispectral sensor disruption.
Ship systems that amplify the distortion signal generated by electronic counter measure systems.
Targeting jammers emitting multi-frequency disruptive signals.
Decrease the targeting speed and range of target ship.
Beef up your sensor strength to resist target jamming.
Reduces the sensors' vulnerability to gravimetric jamming.
Reduces the sensors' vulnerability to Ladar jamming.
Reduces the sensors' vulnerability to Radar jamming.
Reduces the sensors' vulnerability to magnetometric jamming.
Reduces the sensors' vulnerability to multiple forms of jamming.
Slow them down, then smack them down.
Auxiliary systems giving a boost to sensor strength for a short time.
Boost a ship's gravimetric sensor strength for a short duration.
Boost a ship's Ladar sensor strength for a short duration.
Boost a ship's magnetometric sensor strength for a short duration.
Boost a ship's sensors across the spectrum for a short duration.
Boost a ship's radar sensor strength for a short duration.
Boost a target ship's sensor strength for a short time.
Project an electronic signal towards a target, increasing its signature radius.
A ship system that generates a local warp disruption field, preventing warp travel.
Modules used to assist fleet members
Modules that give or improve scanning capabilities of spaceships
For remote scanning of a target ship's cargo hold.
Launcher bays designed to fire scan probes for stellar triangulation.
Provide tactical analysis of a target ship's capabilities.
For analysis of the composition of asteroids and other celestial objects.
Modules that analyze old or recent computer systems in exploration sites.
Modules that give or improve harvesting capabilities of spaceships
Subsystems designed to improve mining laser efficiency.

description: Ammunition for turret, missile and bomb systems can be found in this category, together with cap booster charges, mining crystals, probes, nanite repair paste and module scripts

For use with dreadnought-sized lasers and stationary defense systems.

Hundreds of tiny bites will wear away even the toughest opponent.
Devastating jet-propelled projectiles carrying huge payloads.
The most powerful missiles to be found anywhere.
Lifting-wing, jet-propelled guided missiles with heavy payloads.
Jet-propelled projectiles for heavy assault launchers.

children.marketGroupName: Advanced Long Range Heavy Assault Missiles
children.description: Advanced long range heavy assault missiles.

children.marketGroupName: Advanced High Precision XL Cruise Missiles
children.description: Advanced High Precision XL Cruise Missiles

children.marketGroupName: Advanced High Damage XL Cruise Missiles
children.description: Advanced High Damage XL Cruise Missiles
Deployed into space for scanning or disruption purposes
Give an instant boost to a spaceship's capacitor
Frequency crystals custom-cut for different ore types
Frequency crystals custom-cut for different asteroid ore types
Frequency crystals custom-cut for different moon ore types
Large, area of effect weapons, used by stealth bombers
Scripts that allow for tuning the effects of certain modules
A nanite packed-fluid, used for emergency repairs of ship modules
Exotic Plasma Charges are used in Entropic Disintegrators
For use with dreadnought-sized entropic disintegrators.
Condenser Pack charges used in Vorton Projectors
Area denial ammunition, fired by structure defense systems.

description: Many unusual goods are traded by capsuleers, including various tags, chips, tokens, charters and tools that are used in special activities or have exchange value with non-capsuleers

children.description: Various products used in a variety of industries
Chemicals and waste, pulsing with radiation. Can be bought and sold for profit
Ferrying passengers can give a nice profit
Illegal substances that alter brain chemistry, for good or ill. Transport with caution
Products in high demand with the materialistic public. Can be bought and sold for profit
Proof positive of a bounty hunter's job well done
Proof that there's one less evil bastard in the world.
Physical proof of a dastardly villain's demise.
DNA-imprinted personal insignias, used by empire navies. Transport with caution
Stores artificial intelligence systems. Used when acquiring special ships from Loyalty Point stores
Criminal organizations' identification tags. Can be traded to the empires
The identification tags of CONCORD's most wanted.
Political propaganda and those that engage in it
The required licenses to operate starbases within the borders of the empires
Mysterious pieces of technology of Sleeper origin, coveted by some empire corporations
An Aurum Token is a physical chit that can be redeemed for a predefined amount of AUR currency
These tags can be turned in, in low-security space, for a boost to security rating
These covert operation items are in demand by various factions
These tags can be turned in, at empire navy stations, in return for ISK
Mysterious pieces of technology of unknown origin
Filaments connected to Abyssal pockets with Exotic Particle Storms
Filaments that connect to Abyssal pockets with Dark Matter Fields
Filaments that connect to Abyssal pockets with Plasma Firestorms
Filaments that connect to Abyssal pockets with Gamma-Ray Afterglow
Filaments that connect to Abyssal pockets with Electrical Storms
Filaments that jump fleets unpredictably to other locations in known space.
Filaments that connect to the Abyssal Proving Grounds for limited time PVP events.
Filaments that jump users out of the Triglavian Region Pochven
Filaments that jump users into the Triglavian Region Pochven

description: Capsuleers have several options for modifying their personal capabilities, including cybernetic implants and biochemical boosters

children.description: Implants improve a pilot's performance in various areas. They cannot be removed once inserted
Implants designed to increase a pilot's aptitude in a specialized area.
Implants designed to augment specific aspects of the pilot's mental make-up.
Implants intended for Subcervical Processing Slot 1.
Implants intended for Subcervical Processing Slot 2.
Implants intended for Subcervical Processing Slot 3.
Implants intended for Subcervical Processing Slot 4.
Implants intended for Subcervical Processing Slot 5.
Illegal substances that give temporary effects, but with adverse side-effects as well
Boosters used in reconfiguration of clone mapping to allow the use of Tactical Capsuleer Recloners
Cerebral Accelerators come in a variety of different forms, but in the end the effects are similar. These drugs, devices, and boosters that significantly increase a pilot's skill development.

description: Skills are learned by capsuleer pilots using special data chips known as skillbooks, and these are available for almost any imaginable activity that can be carried out in space

children.description: Skills pertaining to the efficient use of turret-based weapon systems
Skills pertaining to management of large social groups
Skills pertaining to the efficient operation of drones
Skills pertaining to management of a spaceship's electronic systems
Skills pertaining to management of a spaceship's hardware
Skills pertaining to the efficient use of manufacturing facilities and industrial devices
Skills pertaining to the operation of Command Burst modules
Skills pertaining to the fine tuning of a spaceship's installed systems
Skills pertaining to the efficient use of self-propelled warheads
Skills pertaining to navigating your spaceship as quickly and efficiently as possible
Skills pertaining to various fields of scientific knowledge
Skills pertaining to efficient navigation through the social landscape
Skills required for commanding all shapes and sizes of spaceships
Skills pertaining to managing commercial activities
Skills pertaining to signature recognition and identification procedures
Skills pertaining to efficiently extracting raw materials and refining them
Skills pertaining to efficiently protecting the structural integrity of spaceships
Skills pertaining to managing boosters, implants and clone operations
Skills pertaining to management of a spaceship's energy barriers
Skills pertaining to management of a spaceship's sensor and tracking systems
Skills required for the control and remote operation of planetary colonies
Skills pertaining to the use and control of ship subsystems
Skills pertaining to the efficient use of player owned structures

description: Drones are semi-autonomous robotic devices used for military and industrial purposes throughout space

children.description: Drones capable of mining asteroids for raw materials
Drones that affect the tracking and sensor capabilities of ships
Drones that provide support to friendly ships
Drones that interfere with the performance of enemy ships
Drones capable of salvaging wrecks for valuables
Fighters are small combat craft launched in squadrons from Capital Ships and Structures
Single-pilot combat vessels, deployable from Carriers and Supercarriers.
Piloted combat vessels, deployable from Carriers and Supercarriers.
Piloted combat vessels, deployable from Carriers and Supercarriers.

description: The perpetual engine of space industry is driven by vast quantities of materials, components and research equipment that are constantly being traded on the capsuleer market

children.description: The building blocks of New Eden.
Chunks of raw material harvested from asteroids.
An extremely rare and valuable ore, yielding a unique mineral.
Various compounds composed of asteroid ores.
The most common forms of moon ore
Voluminous clouds of various gases, found in space, that can be extracted and used in the manufacturing of biochemical boosters.
Voluminous clouds of various gases that can be found in space.
This rare form of gas can only be harvested in wormhole space.
Ice isotopes harvested from ice asteroids.
The various types of raw materials harvested from the moons of New Eden.
Materials used for Tech II vessel and equipment production.
Pure elements and other raw materials from nature.
Various types of biochemical boosters, most often used by pod pilots.
The first tier of planetary materials.
The second tier of planetary materials.
The third tier of planetary materials.
The fourth tier of planetary materials.
The firth and final tier of planetary materials.
Minerals harvested from refined asteroid ore.
Despite being very old, these materials hold unimaginable technological secrets.
Materials used in the construction of specific factional equipment.
Materials used in the construction of specific factional equipment.
Materials used in the construction of specific factional equipment.
Materials used in the construction of specific factional equipment.
Artifacts of the Yan Jung civilization.
Salvaged bits and pieces from destroyed Rogue Drones, can be integrated with current drone technology for improved performance.
Materials used in the construction of specific factional equipment.
Materials used in the construction of specific factional equipment.
Materials used in the construction of specific factional equipment.
Materials used in the construction of specific factional equipment.
Components are manufactured items used in various industry activities
Components used in the manufacture of Tech II vessels and equipment.
Modular components used in the manufacture of capital ships.
Components to those glorious centers of community, outposts.
Improvements specifically designed for Amarrian outposts.
Improvements specifically designed for Caldari outposts.
Improvements specifically designed for Gallentean outposts.
Improvements specifically designed for Minmatar outposts.
Upgrade platforms for outposts, intended as a base for further improvements.
The building blocks of advanced subsystems.
Modular items used in the manufacture of Space Stations.
Assembled blocks of fuel for starbases and other structures.
Components used in the manufacture of Tech II capital ships.
Construction tools used in Tech II manufacturing.
Various items used in research and invention
Databases used in Tech II research jobs.

description: Capsuleers have many options when they decide to set up a home in space, from personal deployables to capsuleer-controlled outpost stations

children.description: Various structures that can be deployed on behalf of an individual or group of capsuleers
For deep-space storage of valuable materials.
Trap a fly in your web.
Steals resources from Player Owned Structures.
Deployables that monitor bounty payout activity in the system
Structures pertaining to the control and exploitation of solar systems
Upgrades which are installed into the Infrastructure Hub.
Structures used in constructing capsuleer-run starbases
Stationary weapon batteries for starbase defense.
Stationary missile batteries for starbase defense.
Batteries providing electronic countermeasures for starbase defense.
A starbase array designed to neutralize the capacitor of hostile ships in the area.
For storing or providing resources, or regulating material flow in industrial processes.
Anchorable structures for the boosting of a control tower's shield resistances.
Deployable arrays designed to gather minerals from moons.
Deployable structures where chemical processes take place.
Communal hangar structures with divisional compartments.
A bridge of light, spanning the cold and empty void between the stars.
The lock and key to a system's highway of cynosural passage.
A lighthouse in the sea of nothing, casting its cynosural light out to far-off ships.
A large hangar structure, for easy storage of materials and modules.

description:
Rigs and subsystems that alter a starship's attributes in such a way as to make it more effective in its chosen role

Mutaplasmids that permanently alter a module's attributes

description: Capsuleers can exploit the planetary resources of New Eden by establishing command centers on the ground and orbital infrastructure in space

children.description: A Command Center is required to extract resources from a planet
Gives capsuleers stronger control over a planet's resources

description: Capsuleers can choose from a variety of exclusive clothing and accessories

children.description: Clothing worn on the outside of other clothing.
Garments worn on the feet, for fashion, protection against the environment, and adornment.
Any of various garments worn below the waist.
Any of various garments worn below the waist.
Garments worn on the feet, for fashion, protection against the environment, and adornment.
Clothing worn on the outside of other clothing.
Apparel items that supplement an outfit by adding style and class
Eyewear is almost exclusively used for vanity purposes given advances in modern cyberware that renders externally mounted hardware obsolete.
a market group for various prosthetics

description: Special Edition Assets are typically limited run items associated with past events in New Eden, such as the Alliance Tournament
Services available to capsuleers include PLEX, Multiple Pilot Training, Pilot's Body Resculpt Certificates, and Skill Trading items

children.description: PLEX is an item that can be traded between players on the regional market. PLEX can also be used in the New Eden Store to upgrade your account to Omega Clone State,  purchase virtual goods, and activate other account services.
Services available for various customization for capsuleers
Items used to extract and inject skill points.
Items used in the HyperNet Relay

description: Super Kerr-Induced Nanocoatings that modify the visual look of a ship
Modules that provide functionality to Structures

children.description: Quantum Cores are FTL communications facillities vital to the efficient operation of Upwell structures.
